description.value:
You can keep going through sheer willpower—for a little while, at least.

Prerequisites: Wis 13, character level 5th

Benefit: If you would become @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.8rIj0ewW4bL8Uph5]{Confused}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.7PPRS6krnvaTHbxh]{Fascinated}, fatigued, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.nywSVEeDvp1bk7L3]{Shaken}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.ZacF0l6IwqBwToTJ]{Sickened}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.aAQ6SW6iK0EVq8Ce]{Staggered}, you can spend 1 Resolve Point as a reaction to delay the condition’s onset for 1 round. At the beginning of each of your subsequent turns, you can continue to spend 1 Resolve Point to delay the condition’s onset for another round; when you stop spending Resolve Points, the condition takes effect and lasts for its original duration. You can delay only one condition at a time. At 9th level, you can also delay the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.4WXJOFZ4s7TJUW6D]{Cowering}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.2XWEujYSyryB4oHm]{Dazed}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.33ynSbmexuxC3cAQ]{Exhausted}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.DtwiUWi8dpzkq4tM]{Frightened}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.LoRydw1D4bqlbkA2]{Nauseated}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.BVdjvpucmvQU4cc1]{Panicked}, paralyzed, and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.CvsDp0GvojxiF2jz]{Stunned} conditions.
